statements: DELETE FROM quality_control_inspections WHERE inspector_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM quality_control_inspections WHERE inspection_id = 100 AND product_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM quality_control_inspections WHERE inspector_name = 'Inspector X' AND inspection_result = TRUE;
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_name = 'Product ABC' AND manufacturing_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM quality_control_logs WHERE quality_score < 5 AND inspection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_name = 'Sample Product' AND batch_number = 12345;
DELETE FROM inspectors WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com' AND phone_number = '+1234567890';
DELETE FROM inspection_errors WHERE error_type = 'Critical' AND inspection_id = 5;
